q: SELECT c/uid/value, o/name/value, o/data[at0001]/origin/value, o/data[at0001]/events[at0002]/time/value, o/data[at0001]/events[at0002]/data[at0003]/items[at0004]/value/value FROM EHR e [ehr_id/value=$ehr_id] CONTAINS COMPOSITION c [openEHR-EHR-COMPOSITION.minimal.v1] CONTAINS OBSERVATION o [openEHR-EHR-OBSERVATION.minimal.v1]
